title: I need help with someone who is a computer GOD! Need that 60 fps gold.
body:
So i just bought a new PC for about 600$ and i was hoping it would run league at 60 fps, but it seems to jump around between 20-40 give or take. It made me very sad, I was wondering if anyone could do me the solid favor of looking at my specs and helping me figure out what isn't good enough, because i thought it would be good enough specs.

Windows 10 64 bit Acer Aspire TC-280

AMD A10-7800 Radeon R7, 12 Compute Cores 4C +8G 3.50 GHz

12 GIG RAM DDR3

Like should i straight up return it and buy something else, or maybe i can replace just one part, or maybe I can do something else? Help would be greatly appreciated, i just want to play ranked so bad.

replies.body:
I have done all the updates, and done mostly everything on your FPS issue list, except for put my computer in high performance cuz i dont want it to look like shit. I am playing on 1920x1080 resolution which is what my normal screen is at, is that maybe too high?

My monitor is 21.5 inch

Grats on your new rig!  Since it's new, there are likely a lot of updates you need to go through with both your OS and drivers.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help out.  If you still run into any issues, see if setting a framecap through your in-game video options helps!
